articles.title: GOP governor wouldn't say where he was during historic flooding. Now we know - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Nick Watt reports on the whereabouts of Montana Governor Greg Gianforte, whose office wouldn't disclose his location during a week marked by destructive flooding.

articles.title: Why New Jersey and Oregon still don't let you pump your own gas
articles.description: Every state has lifted its ban on self-service gas. Except for New Jersey and Oregon.

articles.title: Here's what it would mean to these Americans if Biden canceled student loan debt
articles.description: About 43 million people are waiting to find out if President Joe Biden will wipe away all or part of their federal student loan debt. CNN spoke with eight former college students about what it would mean for them if Biden canceled some student loan debt.

articles.title: Back-to-back heat waves bake the central and eastern US
